title: Redtape?
content:
Hi there... I was wondering if anybody could Identify the font used for the title "Redtape"   
   
 [https://secure.sasfilms.com/plehouse/images/redtape.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125094612/https:/secure.sasfilms.com/plehouse/images/redtape.jpg)   
   
Thanks in advance
author: tactikal

comments.content:
I think it's Identikal Curvature Rounded "modified". All the glyphs could be very easy to tweak.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125094612im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48150.gif)
Nope... there are subtle differences... although curvature is very close and a very nice font. It could be a last resort if I can't find the actual one.... anybody else?
sorry... I posted before I read what you had written Adriano.... I guess your probably right.... it doesn't get much closer than that.

[there are subtle differences...]   
   
Yes, I agree. Even so, I think we have exact matches for all the glyphs (100% for the R)except the D.   
   
Would be very surprised if exists another font this simmilar.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125094612im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48163.gif)
